justification: "Symptoms of depression were assessed in all samples with the original version of the Beck Depression Inventory (BDI; Beck et al., 1961)."
"We defined remission as a BDI score at the end of treatment of less than 10."

measured_by: change in Beck Depression Inventory (BDI) score from intake to week 4
justification: "We defined the period for early response on the basis of the change in the patient's BDI score between the initial BDI... and week 4 of treatment."
